= Development Downloads =

The files available below are intended to be used for testing or development purposes only, and are not suited for end-users; please, install one of the files at the [#General_Downloads General Downloads section] if you plan to actually use your camera.

  * *Source Code:* Targeted to people interested in development, these packages contain the source code used to build each official release.
      * [http://code.google.com/p/400plus/downloads/list?q=Release+label%3AFeatured+Type%3DSource Source Code].

  * *Nightly builds:* Binaries created automatically every night, directly from the latest version available in our repository.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/400plus/downloads/list?q=label%3ANightlyBuild Nightly builds].

  * *All Downloads:* A complete list of all files currently available.
